mapper.select: SELECT d_title, d_content, d_createTime, diaryNum FROM diary order by d_createTime desc
mapper.insert: insert into diary(d_title, d_content, d_createTime, diaryNum, id) values(#{d_title}, #{d_content}, sysdate, seq_diaryNum.nextval, 'yyk')
mapper.select: SELECT d_title, d_content, d_createTime, diaryNum, id FROM diary where id = 'yyk' and lower(d_title) Like '%' || lower(#{d_title}) || '%' order by d_createTime desc
